com.amazon.device.ads

Class AdSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.device.ads.AdSize

  • public class AdSize
extends java.lang.Object
    Ad sizes supported by the Amazon Mobile Ads API. Dimensions are in device independent pixels, therefore the actual size of the ad in pixels might vary depending on the resolution of the device. Ads will scale accordingly within your ad view container to accommodate varying device resolutions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AdSize SIZE_1024x50
      Defines an ad to be 1024dp W x 50dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_300x250
      Defines an ad to be 300dp W x 250dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_300x50
      Defines an ad to be 300dp W x 50dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_320x50
      Defines an ad to be 320dp W x 50dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_600x90
      Defines an ad to be 600dp W x 90dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_728x90
      Defines an ad to be 728dp W x 90dp H.
      static AdSize SIZE_AUTO
      Defines an ad to be sized automatically.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdSize

        public AdSize(int width,
      int height)
        Constructs an ad size with a specified width and height. For standard ad sizes, you should instead use a predefined AdSize field such as SIZE_320x50.
        Parameters:
        width - The width.
        height - The height.
